extends HookAdapter<java.lang.String>

      • append

        public void append(int code)

        Add GAIJI character. <BR> Use alternative character when it is in appendix package. Otherwise, convert to string "[GAIJI=Ncode]", "[GAIJI=Wcode]".

        Specified by:
